 Promotion for international calling via IDD, 171 và 1717 1. Eligibility: Prepaid, postpaid are MBF subscriber and use International Call Service via IDD/ 171/ 1717 within promotion time 2. Content: a. Benefits: Service Regulation Benefits IDD Applicable for - Mon > Fri: From 11pm the X date to 5am the X+1 Date. - Sat & Sun: All day - Free from the 181 st to 240 th second (Free the 4 th minute) - From 0 > 180 th & from the 241 st onward: apply the current rate charges 171 & 1717 Applicable for all calling: NOT distinguish calling Date and Time. b. Countries (Areas) that apply the promotion rate, are: No Country Country’s Code Area’s Code 1 Australia (Úc) 61 All codes except 145, 147 2 Cambodia (Campuchia) 855 All codes 3 Canada 1 All codes 4 China (Trung quốc) 86 All codes 5 France (Pháp) 33 All codes 6 Germany (Đức) 49 All codes except 115, 180 7 Hongkong 852 All codes 8 India (Ấn độ) 91 All codes 9 Indonesia (In-đô) 62 All codes except 868 10 Japan (Nhật) 81 All codes 11 Korea (Hàn quốc) 82 All codes 12 Laos 856 All codes 13 Malaysia 60 All codes 14 Russia (Nga) 7 All codes except 954 and 7xx - Kazakhtan 15 Singapore 65 All codes 16 Taiwan (Đài Loan) 886 All codes 17 Thailand (Thái Lan) 66 All codes 18 United Kingdom (Anh) 44 All codes except 50, 70, 76, 80, 84, 87, 208779 19 USA (Mỹ) 1 All codes 3. Promotion time: from 01/06/2013 to 30/06/2013 IDD&#12289;171 &#21450;1717&#26041;&#24335; &#22269;&#38469;&#38271;&#36884;&#30005;&#35805; &#20248;&#24800;&#27963;&#21160; 1. &#20248;&#24800;&#23545;&#35937;&#65306; MF &#39044;&#20184;&#36153;&#12289;&#21518;&#20184;&#36153;&#23458;&#25143; 2. &#20248;&#24800;&#20869;&#23481;&#65306; a. &#22269;&#38469;&#38271;&#36884; &#20248;&#24800;&#36164;&#36153;&#65306; &#19994;&#21153; IDD, 171​ &#6035;&#6071;&#6020; 1717 1. &#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6102; &#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6036;&#6020;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6075;&#6035;,&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6036;&#6020;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6021;&#6070;&#6086;&#6017;&#6082;&#6016;&#6086;&#6038;&#6075;&#6020;&#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6043;&#6078;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034; 3. &#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035; ​&#6102;​ &#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; ​​​ 01/06/2013 &#6026;&#6043;&#6091;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 30/06/2013
